$interpreted: Platypus: Qua kekekek~
Hestia: Eh? Is that true?
Pang: What's wrong, Hestia?

Hestia: This little fella said that a human has trespassed into Maple Lake and is arriving here very soon.
On top of that, it's someone we all know...
Platypus: Keke~

Hestia: Eh? Sharice?
She had the gall to come back here!?
Puggi: Sweet Sharice? Did she return because she missed me too much?

Pang: Stop your nonsense... Why would she return to Maple Lake? 
Did something happen to her in the army?

Sharice: The G.O.A.T, Sharice Carterwell is here!
Long time no see, guys~

Pang: You seem cheery, good to see. 
How's everything going?
Puggi: Pang my man your questions are too direct you don't flirt with ladies like that.
Puggi: Now, even I can't do anything because you left sweet Sharice nowhere to hide. Look at her; she's bright red from ear to ear, like an apple~
Sharice: I'm not blushing! You're blushing!
Hestia: Hmph, I don't want to talk to her. I'll take my leave first.
Sharice: Hold it right there, fish freak. I have business with you!
Pang: What, so you're here for Hestia?

Puggi: Hoho~ look at you big fella, are you feeling down because she's not here for you? 
Told you that you need to learn from me if you want to get popular with the ladies...
Hestia: Like I said, I'm hiding from someone I don't want to see. That's why I accidentally trespassed into your territory. I have no intention to disturb you.
Hestia: If you keep being so unreasonable, I'm going to get mad too!

Sharice: (This is the opportunity to show my strength!)
(As long as I can show what I'm capable of and that I can help Hestia defeat her enemies,)
Sharice: (she won't be mad at me anymore. Perhaps then will she be willing to help me out...)
Sharice: Eat my spear!!
Sharice: How was that? Did you see what the great Sharice Carterwell is capable of?
Hestia: Umm... T, thank you...

Sharice: Good, since you're so thankful of me, 
give me the scales on your tail, fish freak~
You're gonna say yes, right?
Hestia: HUH!? What makes you think I would say yes to such a ridiculous request?
Sharice: Eh......? B, but... I just helped you. See how strong I am...
Hestia: Who cares if you're strong or not!? I'm still not your friend!
Sharice: I, I don't understand...

Sharice: You have the same reaction as everyone else... 
I don't get it... Why am I excluded from everyone...

Sharice: I need to obtain your scales no matter what.
If you don't give it to me, I'll have to do it the hard way!
Hestia: You... you unreasonable, wretched human!
